text:
@BillGates Class of 2020 is dead without Cloriquine treatment.
Could the UK, US Government or Brazilian Government do some CORONAVIRUS test on Papaia or other fruits?
Was sucessful positive in Tanzania.
#papaiaknows
#obamagate
#whopapaiagate
